txt.en:
You have acquired a socketable Essence or Tracery. These items can be used in conjunction with socketed items to create gear with custom stats. Once you find a piece of socketed gear that has a usage level that is greater than or equal to your Essence, you may apply that Essence to the gear and gain its stats.

Traceries behave much like Essences except with Legendary Items. These Traceries have specific slot types that they require in order to be slotted, but may also be leveled up using Enhancement Runes. 

Essences & Traceries may be removed by using an Essence Removal Scroll.
